title: YIO Integration Kodi Schema
description: Required data points to set up a kodi integrations.

access_token.title: Access token
access_token.description: Not user input. Access token generated after authenticating to Kodi.

refresh_token.title: Refresh token
refresh_token.description: Not user input. Refresh token generated after authenticating to Kodi.

client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: Client ID from the Kodi Developer page.

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: Client secret from the Kodi Developer page.

entity_id.title: The entity_id schema
entity_id.description: Not user input. A unique entity id.
